# 25th Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 25th edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. Films of 2015 which had not already won a major domestic film award were eligible. The ceremony took place on May 3, 2016, at Theatre Shinjuku in Tokyo.
Awards
*Best Film: Bakuman
*Best Director: Shinya Tsukamoto (Fires on the Plain)
*Best Actress: Mikako Tabe (Piece of Cake, Midnight Diner)
*Best Actor: Shota Sometani (Kabukicho Love Hotel, ')
